document_data.name: ''Burning Earth''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Burning Earth''''' was a unique [[flame tongue]] sword.
document_data.Description:
The blade of ''Burning Earth'' burned with flames when drawn. The grip was crafted in a manner that was ill-suited for most [[humanoid]]s. When held, it created tension in the wielder's arm, though not enough to impede their skill in combat.

It bore a mysterious [[rune]] that indicated the sword was empowered by [[Toril]] itself.
document_data.Powers: ''Burning Earth'' possessed a ''+1 [[Item enchantment|enchantment]]'' and burned foes with [[magic]]al flame. It was particularly harmful to [[lycanthrope]]s, [[troll]]s, [[winter wolf|winter wolves]], and the [[undead]].
document_data.History:
It was unknown who or what created the sword, but legend stated that it was older than the [[Anauroch]] desert.

Some time before the {{YearlinkName|1368}}, the sword made its way into the basement of [[Durlag's Tower]].
